text: Victor Puşcaş (born July 18, 1943 in Arioneşti) is a Moldovan politician. He served as a member of the Parliament of Moldova (1990–1994), Minister for Relations with Parliament (1994–1995), Chairman of the Supreme Court of Justice of Moldova (1995–2001), President of the Superior Council of Magistrates (1998–2001) and Chairman of the Constitutional Court of Moldova (2001–2007). == External links == * Biografia sa pe situl Curţii Constituţionale a Republicii Moldova * Decretul nr. 57 din 17 martie 1995 cu privire la conferirea gradului superior de calificare de judecător dlui Victor Puşcaş, Preşedintele Judecătoriei Supreme * Cine au fost şi ce fac deputaţii primului Parlament din R. Moldova (1990-1994)? * Declaraţia deputaţilor din primul Parlament * Site-ul Parlamentului Republicii Moldova == References == Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Moldova State University alumni Category:Moldovan MPs 1990–1994 Category:Deputy Presidents of the Moldovan Parliament Category:Popular Front of Moldova MPs Category:Recipients of the Order of the Republic (Moldova) Category:Recipients of the Order of Honour (Moldova)
title: Victor Pușcaș
